name: Flying Munchman
description:
Game jam game I made for the October 2021 Repl.it jam with the theme BIG.

Steer the Flying Munchman across the sea to fight ghosts and cannons and then eat their souls

CONTRLSA and D or left and right arrow key to rotate the ship

W or up arrow to move the ship forward

S or down arrow to move the ship backwards

Space to shoot the cannons

Hold shift to speed up your ship

All sound effects are royalty free and provided by Zapsplat.com
